ygData.subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 196
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, I wonder how his ISP feels about him spamming. can someone *forward* his original email to the list?  my roomate deleted all of them..... Karl
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, I wonder how his ISP feels about him spamming.
can someone *forward* his original email to the list? my roomate deleted
all of them.....

Karl
>
> AGAIN I thought this guy was gone?
> I took it upon myself to post this message on the
> other Egroup message boards because this guy is
> really getting annoying, I had to post this 7 times
> besides this one...
>
> This is getting annoying out of the 10 lists I'm
> currently on this guy is on 8 of them selling his
> cheats. Already one Moderator has kicked him and now
> he hits everyother site he can get on pushing his
> product. This ain't E-Bay buddy! Your making it
> annoying to check e-mails about everquest! Please I
> urge you Moderators to do something about these
> commercial interuptions thank you.
> Sinchi
>
> Maybe there will be something done about him.
> Sorry to get off topic with this but I know you all
> understand and most atleast agree with me. Thank you.
>
